column4: I have everything set up okay on the ubuntu machine.  Do you know what I need to do on the WIndows machine?
is samba running on the ubuntu machine?
Yes, samba is already running on ubuntu.  I don't need help with ubuntu.  I need help with MS WIndows.  I haven't used it since Win2k came out.
be sure the ubuntu machine is also running on the same workgroup/domain that the windows machines are on
